Package org.jvnet.hk2.junit

Class Summary
Hk2RunnerBeforeAndAfterTest A suite of tests for testing {link @Before} and {link @After} test annotations.
Hk2RunnerBeforeAndAfterTest.ExceptionTest Test for correct behavior when a method annotated with {link @Before} or {link @Before} throws an exception
Hk2RunnerBeforeAndAfterTest.ExceptionTest.TestClassWithAfterException A simple test class that throws an exception in an @After method
Hk2RunnerBeforeAndAfterTest.ExceptionTest.TestClassWithBeforeException A simple test class that throws an exception in a @Before method
Hk2RunnerBeforeAndAfterTest.PositiveTest Test class to ensure all @Before methods are called prior to each test and all @After methods are called after each test
Hk2RunnerTest General tests of Hk2Runner & Hk2RunnerOptions.
Hk2RunnerTest2  
Hk2RunnerTestBase Testing Hk2Runner & Hk2RunnerOptions when annotations reside on parent class
Hk2RunnerTestModule  
Hk2RunnerTestModuleTest  
Hk2TestServicesTest Unit tests for the Hk2TestServices class.
